"Envoy of Hell":
"I'm lucky to be alive, I tell you...
I was just down in the Volcanic Caverns,
and you'll never believe what I saw.
This huge dragon with sharp rocks on its
head just jumped right out of the ground!
I remember it had these huge, fin-like ears.
You say it's called a Caterdra'n?
Well, it's terrifying. I should get a medal
just for having escaped with my life!
If you know how to beat it, tell me!"
